resources.string:
Project members enjoy access to the following features and benefits:

  • Access to entire 5,000+ course library
  • Learning paths
  • Skill measurement
  • Exercise files
  • Course learning checks
  • Completion certificates
  • Mobile apps
  • Offline viewing

string-array.name: questions_array
string-array.item: Is discount offered on all products?
Do you have any other offers running?
Do you keep only packaged rice, dal and other staples?
Can I buy fresh fruits and vegetables from here?

string-array.name: answers_array
string-array.item: We are a network of \'Deep Discounted\' grocery and daily essentials stores which provide convenience, value and variety next door.
Yes, we have minimum 11% to 50% OFF on everything, everyday.
Yes, from time to time we have different offers running, from Buy One Get One Free to flat 20% off and more on everything. Keep checking the app to stay updated with the offers.
We have a wide variety of branded and loose staples, in different mrp ranges.
Currently we do not have fresh fruits and vegetables.
You can find your nearest store here:
